00036 #include <math.h>
00037 #include "MaxTemplate.hpp"
00038 #include "QualityMetric.hpp"
00039 #include "MsqError.hpp"

00041 namespace MESQUITE_NS {

00043 MaxTemplate::MaxTemplate(QualityMetric *qualitymetric) 
00044    : ObjectiveFunctionTemplate(qualitymetric) {}
00045

00047 MaxTemplate::~MaxTemplate(){
00048

00050 
00051 ObjectiveFunction* MaxTemplate::clone() const
00052   { return new MaxTemplate(get_quality_metric()); }
00053   
00054 void MaxTemplate::clear()
00055   { }
00056 
00057 bool MaxTemplate::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00058                             PatchData& pd,
00059                             double& value_out,
00060                             bool free,
00061                             MsqError& err )
00062 {
00063   if (type != ObjectiveFunction::CALCULATE) {
00064     MSQ_SETERR(err)(
00065       "MaxTemplate does not support block coodinate descent algoritms",
00066       MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
00067     return false;
00068   }
00069 
00070   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00071   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, free, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00072   const double sign = qm->get_negate_flag();
00073   
00074     // calculate OF value for just the patch
00075   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00076   double value;
00077   value_out = -HUGE_VAL;
00078   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00079   {
00080     bool result = qm->evaluate( pd, *i, value, err );
00081     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00082       return false;
00083       
00084     value *= sign;
00085     if (value > value_out)
00086       value_out = value;
00087   }
00088   
00089   return true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 } // namespace Mesquite
